projects.name: Jalebi Design
projects.overview: A responsive website showcasing designs for websites and mobile applications.
projects.description: Built using React to ensure scalability and enhanced user experience, highlighting creative design solutions.

projects.name: Digitlay Resource Hub

projects.name: Wave
projects.overview: A government initiative promoting India as a global hub for cost-effective content development.

projects.name: Jusplay
projects.overview: A toy rental service platform offering a diverse range of high-quality toys for children.
projects.description: Resolved critical bugs, improving platform stability and user experience. Built on a Pay Per Use model with sustainability initiatives.

projects.overview: A service-based company specializing in website and application development.
projects.description: Developed their website using React and DaizyUi, ensuring a modern, scalable, and user-friendly platform tailored to their business needs.
